description.part1: Get to know your dog the best you can and give them a home they deserve.
description.part2: Our website lets you identify over 100+ breeds of doggos and gives you up to date information about them.

guidelines.title: Prediction Guidelines
guidelines.note: Following these guidelines will help our AI provide more accurate breed predictions.

errors.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload an image (JPG, PNG).
errors.selectImageFirst: Please select an image file first.
errors.lowConfidence: Low confidence in prediction. Please try a clearer image.
errors.connectError: Failed to connect to the prediction service. Check console for details.

errors.failedToCrop: Failed to crop image. Please try again.

whatIs.question: What is Pawdentify?
whatIs.answer: Pawdentify is an AI-powered dog breed identification app that helps you identify your dog's breed by uploading a photo.

accuracy.question: How accurate is the breed prediction?
accuracy.answer: Our AI model provides high accuracy predictions, but results may vary based on image quality and clarity. For best results, upload clear, well-lit photos of your dog's face.

multiplePhotos.question: Can I upload multiple photos?
multiplePhotos.answer: Currently, you can upload one photo at a time for prediction. We're working on batch processing features for future updates.

formats.question: What image formats are supported?
formats.answer: We support common image formats including JPG, PNG, and JPEG. Make sure your image is under 10MB in size.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Yes, we take privacy seriously. Uploaded images are processed securely and not stored permanently on our servers.

theme.label: Theme

saveHistory.description: Keep track of your identifications locally
